attributes.action: stop veolia from operating sandwell's waste system due to the fact that they are building train and tram routes into illegal israeli settlements which contravene the 4th Geneva convention.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This is a contractual issue for Sandwell Council to take a decison upon.

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
